entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Clearing this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 22 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 15. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Saturday 07 January 2023
